title: It’s Grilling Season! Here are 35 of My Favorite Recipes to Throw On The Grill.
description: These are 35 of my very best grilling recipes! Everything from vegetables and sides to pizzas, whole chicken, sandwiches and more. I love using the grill year round, but something about summer is extra special! It’s time! I live for grilling season. Actually, grilling season for us is all year – no matter the weather. […] The post It’s Grilling Season! Here are 35 of My Favorite Recipes to Throw On The Grill. appeared first on How Sweet Eats.
author: Jessica
excerpt: These are 25 of my very best grilling recipes! Everything from vegetables and sides to pizzas, whole chicken, sandwiches and more. I love using the grill year round, but something about summer is extra special!
text: These are 35 of my very best grilling recipes! Everything from vegetables and sides to pizzas, whole chicken, sandwiches and more. I love using the grill year round, but something about summer is extra special! It’s time! I live for grilling season. Actually, grilling season for us is all year – no matter the weather. But there is just SOMETHING about when spring and summer hit, the first days of warm weather, that get me super excited for grilling. I have so many incredible recipes, ranging from our favorite side dishes, sandwiches, salads, pizzas, and even breads to throw on the grill. The flavor can’t be beat, the clean up is minimal, you get to enjoy the weather outside and everything just tastes better on the grill! Share some of your favorites below! I love finding something super simple and flavorful for busy weeknights. 35 Best Grilling Recipes Grilled chicken orzo salad with avocado Grilled chicken caprese pasta salad Cedar plank salmon Everyday grilled steak salad Grilled buffalo chicken chopped salad Grilled smoked sausage skewers Greek salad with grilled garlic baguettes Grilled lemon shrimp with pesto couscous Grilled cauliflower salad with feta vinaigrette Grilled zucchini with burrata and pine nuts Blueberry chicken salad Grilled buffalo chicken sandwiches Grilled vegetable orzo with smashed feta vinaigrette Grilled naan vegetable pizzas Spatchcock chicken with cola BBQ sauce Grilled zucchini and corn orzo Grilled honey butter chicken Grilled feta with chimichurri and pistachios Grilled fish tacos Summer grilled chicken skewers with basil couscous Grilled gorgonzola potatoes Filet and potato skewers with rosemary chimichurri Grilled vegetable and halloumi skewers Grilled BBQ chicken pizza Grilled peppers with burrata and breadcrumbs Grilled pesto, peach and prosciutto pizza Grilled chicken rice bowls Grilled honey mustard chicken Grilled chicken watermelon salad Grilled salmon club sandwich Grilled chicken caesar sandwiches Smoky chicken nachos Pulled pork & sweet corn pizza Grilled asparagus caesar Chili lime chicken tacos with pineapple salsa Grilled greek chicken pitas Grilled caramelized onion focaccia  The best hot dog bar!
html:
These are 35 of my very best grilling recipes! Everything from vegetables and sides to pizzas, whole chicken, sandwiches and more. I love using the grill year round, but something about summer is extra special!

It’s time!

I live for grilling season.

Actually, grilling season for us is all year – no matter the weather. But there is just SOMETHING about when spring and summer hit, the first days of warm weather, that get me super excited for grilling. I have so many incredible recipes, ranging from our favorite side dishes, sandwiches, salads, pizzas, and even breads to throw on the grill. The flavor can’t be beat, the clean up is minimal, you get to enjoy the weather outside and everything just tastes better on the grill!

Share some of your favorites below! I love finding something super simple and flavorful for busy weeknights.

35 Best Grilling Recipes

Grilled chicken orzo salad with avocado

Grilled chicken caprese pasta salad

Cedar plank salmon

Everyday grilled steak salad

Grilled buffalo chicken chopped salad

Grilled smoked sausage skewers

Greek salad with grilled garlic baguettes

Grilled lemon shrimp with pesto couscous

Grilled cauliflower salad with feta vinaigrette

Grilled zucchini with burrata and pine nuts

Blueberry chicken salad

Grilled buffalo chicken sandwiches

Grilled vegetable orzo with smashed feta vinaigrette

Grilled naan vegetable pizzas

Spatchcock chicken with cola BBQ sauce

Grilled zucchini and corn orzo

Grilled honey butter chicken

Grilled feta with chimichurri and pistachios

Grilled fish tacos

Summer grilled chicken skewers with basil couscous

Grilled gorgonzola potatoes

Filet and potato skewers with rosemary chimichurri

Grilled vegetable and halloumi skewers

Grilled BBQ chicken pizza

Grilled peppers with burrata and breadcrumbs

Grilled pesto, peach and prosciutto pizza

Grilled chicken rice bowls

Grilled honey mustard chicken

Grilled chicken watermelon salad

Grilled salmon club sandwich

Grilled chicken caesar sandwiches

Smoky chicken nachos

Pulled pork & sweet corn pizza

Grilled asparagus caesar

Chili lime chicken tacos with pineapple salsa

Grilled greek chicken pitas

Grilled caramelized onion focaccia 

The best hot dog bar!
